San Antonio was ranked as the nation: s top-performing local economy by the Milken Institute.
The ranking was based on San Antonio: s ability to create and sustain jobs, as well as its job and pay gains.
The Milken Institute: s annual list gives priority to job and pay gains, as well as technology measures such as local growth in high-tech GDP and concentration of tech industries.
San Antonio: s rise in the ranking was part of a trend in which Texas cities have dominated the list as the nation recovers from the recession.
